title: Ketheric's Warhammer
content:
Ketheric's Warhammer Rare 3~15 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d10 (1d8)+1 Bludgeoning+ 1d4Psychic Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: This hammer's weight is centred on enchanted obsidian at the base of the head. Some nights before bed, Ketheric would sneak a whey-faced glance at the hammer, and think about the stone, and wonder what unknown facet of his heart wore his weight. WarhammerVersatile 2.7 310

Ketheric's Warhammer

Versatile - Wielding With B
